pageContext.claim: ““I said, ‘Charlie, let me ask you, what’s bigger for the Jewish people: giving the embassy to Jerusalem, it becomes the capital of Israel. What’s bigger? That or the Golan Heights?’ He said, ‘Neither.’ I said, ‘What does that mean?’ He said, ‘The biggest thing of all is what you did by ending the Iran nuclear catastrophe.' I think that's true.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump repeated this same story — word for word — naming three separate prominent Jewish people and claiming each of them had the same response. On this day, he named two different people in different events just hours apart.
